text:
Whitehall 3-3600
April 30, 1952
Miss Dallas W. Smythe
Communications Research Institute
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dallas:
I hasten to acknowledge your letter of April
26th wherein you request $13 worth of stappa to carry out
your functions as director of Studies.
3y copy of this letter Mr. Sehooley is requested
to make this postage available to you without delay. If need
be, this can be a charge to the Presidentâ€™s office.
Two hundred letterheads and a hundred envelopes
are being forwarded to you under separate cover.
With best wishes.
Cordially yours.
sns/h
Seymour II. Siegel
Director
